definition: to drip/to strain or filter/a trickle

sentences.english: I enjoy the rhythm of the falling rain.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡聽淅淅瀝瀝的雨聲。

sentences.english: a curtain of cloud underspread the sky and a few drops of rain fell audibly.
sentences.chinese: 一簾烏雲在天空鋪開，淅淅瀝瀝下了幾滴雨。

sentences.english: I was disturbed by he pitter-patter of rain on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 屋頂上淅淅瀝瀝的雨聲擾亂了我的思緒。

sentences.english: Listen to the rhythm of the falling rain.
Rain to listen to stars Potaninia heart, I love Long Yuet height.
sentences.chinese: 淅瀝綿雨聽星心，朗月高空愛意真。

sentences.english: What constantly recurs to me is "The rain patters, the leaf quivers."[1]
sentences.chinese: 我時常能記起的是“天上淅瀝下雨，樹葉婆娑搖曳”。

sentences.english: This spring rain has been pattering continuously for a whole day.
sentences.chinese: 這場春雨淅淅瀝瀝的下了一整天了。

sentences.english: These glass screens are printed with a linear pattern that is intended to be evocative of falling rain.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃飾有線條狀圖案，像淅淅瀝瀝的雨簾。

sentences.english: Unexpectedly, a quarter of an hour less than a days have changed, intermittent underground started to rain.
sentences.chinese: 不料一刻鐘不到天就變了，淅淅瀝瀝地下起雨來。

sentences.english: Rain also lightly to the next. "City adventure" fierily conducted.
sentences.chinese: 雨還在淅淅瀝瀝的下着，“城市探險”火熱進行。

sentences.english: "Patter" this word is to be used to describe rain's.
sentences.chinese: “淅瀝淅瀝”這個詞是用來形容雨的。

sentences.english: "Patter" this word is to be used to describe rain's.
sentences.chinese: “淅瀝淅瀝”這個詞是用來形容雨的。

sentences.english: On-top rain sound sign drip, clear cold penetrate curtain.
sentences.chinese: 之上，雨聲淅瀝，清寒透幕。

sentences.english: Along with the sunshine, there's got to be a little rain sometime.
sentences.chinese: 伴着陽光，那裏有時會有淅淅瀝瀝的小雨。

sentences.english: Just remember that the rain outside looked crash.
sentences.chinese: 只記得外面雨下得淅瀝嘩啦。

definition: Xiangyun county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

soughing/whistling or rushing sound (of the wind in trees, the sea etc)
